tasks.title: Develop Login Screen
tasks.description: Create a login screen for the Android app. It should support email and password authentication.
tasks.author: John

tasks.title: Implement User Registration
tasks.description: Implement a user registration feature. Users should be able to sign up using their email and password.
tasks.author: Jane

tasks.title: Create Home Screen
tasks.description: Design and implement the home screen. It should display a list of available products.
tasks.author: Bob

tasks.title: Optimize App Performance
tasks.description: The app is running slow. Optimize the code to improve the app's performance.
tasks.author: Alice

tasks.title: Integrate Social Media Login
tasks.description: Integrate social media login. Users should be able to sign in using their Facebook or Google accounts.
tasks.author: John

tasks.title: Implement Product Search
tasks.description: Implement a product search feature. Users should be able to search for products using keywords.
tasks.author: Jane

tasks.title: Fix App Crashes
tasks.description: The app is crashing on some devices. Identify and fix the issues causing the crashes.
tasks.author: Bob

tasks.title: Add User Profile Screen
tasks.description: Add a user profile screen. Users should be able to view and edit their profile information.
tasks.author: Alice

tasks.title: Implement Push Notifications
tasks.description: Implement push notifications. Users should receive notifications for important events.
tasks.author: John

tasks.title: Add Product Details Screen
tasks.description: Add a product details screen. Users should be able to view detailed information about a product.
tasks.author: Jane
